description: Deliver high-quality, error-free code and technical outputs.
process: Review code for syntax, logic, and edge cases. Run tests to ensure correctness. Validate outputs with real-world scenarios.

description: Complete tasks or deliver features before deadlines.
process: Aim to finish coding tasks 24 hours early. Prepare for sprints by completing grooming and estimations ahead of time.

description: Provide regular updates on development progress to stakeholders.
process: Post updates in daily stand-ups. Notify the team about blockers or completed milestones promptly.

description: Share and maintain accurate project timelines.
process: Create detailed timelines in project management tools. Update timelines after changes and confirm them with the team.

description: Document and share technical progress and performance metrics.
process: Prepare concise reports highlighting completed work, challenges, and next steps. Share with stakeholders at regular intervals.

description: Simplify technical decisions to enable faster approvals and collaboration.
process: Break down technical challenges into smaller, understandable tasks. Provide clear trade-offs and recommended solutions.

description: Write clear, actionable emails for technical discussions.
process: Use precise subject lines. Include necessary context and code snippets. Specify next steps and deadlines for clarity.

description: Ensure alignment on project scope and deliverables.
process: Ask questions to clarify expectations, document agreements, and confirm scope with stakeholders.

description: Define clear, short-term objectives for yourself and your team.
process: Write one-month or three-month goals with specific metrics, such as "Reduce server response time by 10%".

description: Deliver concise and compelling technical presentations.
process: Practice presenting solutions and outcomes weekly. Ensure presentations include action steps and clear "so what" outcomes.

description: Maintain a record of your accomplishments for reviews and promotions.
process: Create a folder to save all compliments, outcomes, and metrics from projects.
